title: Add cloud deployment configurations (GCP, AWS, Azure)
description:
**As a** legal tech operator
**I want** cloud deployment templates for GCP/AWS/Azure
**So that** I can deploy Consoul securely and cost-efficiently

**Context:**
Legal industry needs cloud-agnostic deployment (not locked into single vendor). Need Infrastructure-as-Code templates for:
- Container deployment (Cloud Run, ECS Fargate, Container Apps)
- Redis for session storage
- Secrets management
- Auto-scaling configuration
- Cost optimization

Target: Deploy in < 30 minutes on any cloud.

**Technical Notes:**
- Create: deployment/cloud/ directory
- Create: deployment/cloud/gcp/ (Cloud Run + Memorystore)
- Create: deployment/cloud/aws/ (ECS Fargate + ElastiCache)
- Create: deployment/cloud/azure/ (Container Apps + Redis Cache)
- Tools: Terraform for IaC, Docker for containers
- Pattern: Multi-stage Docker build (from SOUL-296)

Deployment components:
1. Container: Consoul server (FastAPI)
2. Redis: Session storage
3. Secrets: API keys (Secret Manager/Parameter Store/Key Vault)
4. Monitoring: Cloud-native (CloudWatch, Stackdriver, Azure Monitor)
5. Load balancer: HTTPS termination

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** GCP deployment template
**When** I run terraform apply
**Then** deploys Cloud Run + Memorystore Redis + Secret Manager

**Given** AWS deployment template
**When** I run terraform apply
**Then** deploys ECS Fargate + ElastiCache + Secrets Manager

**Given** Azure deployment template
**When** I run terraform apply
**Then** deploys Container Apps + Azure Cache + Key Vault

**Given** cost optimization configured
**When** reviewing cloud bills
**Then** uses serverless/pay-per-use services (minimize idle costs)

**Testing Considerations:**
- Test Terraform apply/destroy cycle
- Test HTTPS endpoints
- Test Redis connectivity
- Test secret injection
- Verify auto-scaling triggers
- Test cross-region deployment

**Implementation Hints:**
- Docker: Multi-stage build (builder â†’ production)
- GCP: Cloud Run with Memorystore (VPC connector)
- AWS: ECS Fargate with ElastiCache (security groups)
- Azure: Container Apps with Azure Cache (VNET integration)
- Secrets: Inject via env vars at runtime
- HTTPS: Cloud-native load balancers (automatic certs)
- Auto-scaling: CPU/memory thresholds
- Cost: Use serverless where possible (Cloud Run, Fargate)
- Document in deployment/cloud/README.md
- Include cost estimates in each cloud template
- Add deployment/cloud/quickstart.sh for automation
- Reference: SOUL-296 for server Docker image
- Reference: SOUL-297 for Redis session storage
